lines.text: No! Once the wings have brushed you, you're mine forever!
Was it in Africa?
Yes.
How do you know that?
Well, it looked like something I saw at the natural history museum.
But you weren't suppose to remember anything.
I know.
What's the matter with you?

[hesitant, stuttering]
I'm autistic.
How do you mean?
I'm withdrawn. I can't talk.
But you're talking now.
[shakes head no]
Yes, you are. I can hear you.
You can hear me?
Sure!

[pause]
What's the matter with you?
I was possessed by a demon. Oh, it's okay. He's gone!
I've flown this route before. It was on the wings of a demon.
Pazuzu, king of the evil spirits of the air, help me to find Kokumo!
When the wings have brushed you... is there no hope once the wings have brushed you?
If Pazuzu comes for you I will spit a leopard.
You're in dire need of prayer. I suggest you make a retreat.
A retreat? Why not an advance?
Call me by my dream name. Call me!
[regarding the Catholic Church]
Satan has become an embarrassment to our progressive views.
All the time, I longed to see her. Finally, I came back and found that when I'm with her is the only time when I'm at peace. Why would that be? I can't understand it, it frightens me!
Have you tried a psychiatrist or a priest?
I'm talking to one now, aren't I?
Don't you understand... that I was face to face with the Evil that's inside her. Your machine has proved scientifically that there's an ancient demon locked within her!
You've got to fight that demon that's inside her! It's preventing her from reaching full spiritual power!
Let's stick to science.
Don't hide behind science, you're better than that!
You realize what you're up against, don't you? Evil. Evil is a spiritual being, alive and living, perverted and perverting, weaving its way insidiously into the very fabric of life.
Was, uh... was Father Merrin afraid?
You'd better see where it happened.
If he can teach me how he has survived Pazuzu... I'll come back and let you know.
Pazuzu has brushed me with his wings.
Don't worry. Father Merrin will help us.
If I can find this man Kokumo, it would prove beyond doubt that the exorcisms were valid.
The power... it's getting nearer. Can't you feel it? The power is immense. It fills me. I can do anything.

Not only Kokumo, but others like him began to appear in the world. I found these people where I could, and tried to protect them against evil. So Satan has sent Pazuzu to destroy this goodness. Phillip, you must take my place. She's precious, and I entrust her to you.
You want me to take you to him?
Yes.
Come. Fly the teeth of the wind. Share my wings.
Where is she?
She's on the roof. She's always there. I can't lock her up.
Father, see me. Please, see me.
I wish you'd help Father Lamont. He needs your help.
What do you mean? How can I help him? I don't know how to help him.
Yes, you do.
Regan, what are you talking about?
You know... going into sync... trying to reach him like that.
You told me he was in Africa.
When you're in sync, it's different. I mean, it doesn't matter where you are. You can find them... you know, help them.
Regan, is that why you haven't been coming to see me? 'Cause I won't let you into sync?
Yes.
I can't. I have to do what I think is best for you.
Father, please don't be lost to me.
Kill her! We command you!
You must tear out her evil heart.
Pazuzu's Regan is the only Regan.
The enemy of the human race is subdued.
Were you ever...
Possessed by Pazuzu?
[laughs]
That's what my mother used to tell me.
He's with me. Come down. Down, Father. To meet me.
Regan! Come! We're going flying far, far away!
It was horrible, utterly horrible... and fascinating!
Be joined with us, Father.
[last lines]
Lady, are you okay?
[first lines]
[theatrical version]
Father! Agh! Agh! Oh, Father!
[first lines]
[pre-release version]

[narrating]
Father Lanchester Merrin died in Georgetown near Washington, D.C. while attempting to exorcise a 12-year-old child, Regan MacNeil.
It's hard to live alone. Don't you ever need a woman, Father?
Yes.
Merrin defeated you.
No, in his own place of power he gained a little time. That's all.
It was because the boy was a healer. That's why you attacked him. Now I see. But Merrin saved him.
Never! I could claim Kokumo even now. I'll show you power.
He's still alive! Where is he?
You want me to take you to him?
Yes.
Are you sure?
Show me.

[Pazuzu's and Regan's voice speaking at the same time]
Come, fly the teeth of the wind. Share my wings.
